description: This file defines a workflow class 'HackerNewsReporter' that fetches top stories from Hacker News, processes them, and generates a report. It also contains code to set up a database connection and execute the workflow, including environment variable handling and SSL certificate management.

classes.name: HackerNewsReporter
classes.description: A workflow class that retrieves top stories from Hacker News, processes them, and generates a detailed report.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches the top stories from Hacker News API and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow to fetch top stories, generate reports, and yield responses.
